title: Ep - 57 - AMANDA STANTON – BACHELOR AND BACHELOR IN PARADISE
description:
Amanda Stanton from The Bachelor and Bachelor in Paradise responds to criticism she joined both shows as a single mother, discusses her engagement with Josh Murray, and her short relationship with Robby. She gives more insight into her life as a mother, her burgeoning career in beauty, and why she will never pursue love on another reality show. 


www.loveandknuckles.com

Facebook: facebook.com/loveandknuckles

Twitter: @katecasey

Instagram: @katecaseyca

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
